categories.name: Endpoint Logs
categories.description: EDR telemetry, process creation, file events, registry changes
categories.examples: CrowdStrike, Carbon Black, Defender for Endpoint, Sysmon, osquery

categories.name: Windows Event Logs
categories.description: Security, System, PowerShell, WMI, Sysmon event logs
categories.examples: Event IDs 4688, 4624, 4672, Sysmon, PowerShell Script Block

categories.name: Network Logs
categories.description: Firewall, IDS/IPS, NetFlow, DNS, packet capture
categories.examples: Palo Alto, Suricata, Zeek, Cisco ASA, DNS server logs

categories.name: Cloud Logs
categories.description: Cloud provider audit and activity logs
categories.examples: AWS CloudTrail, Azure Activity Log, GCP Audit Log, O365 UAL

categories.name: Identity & Auth Logs
categories.examples: Active Directory, Okta, Azure AD, LDAP, RADIUS, MFA logs

categories.name: Email Logs
categories.description: Mail gateway, message trace, phishing detection
categories.examples: Exchange, O365 Message Trace, Proofpoint, Mimecast

categories.name: Web & Proxy Logs
categories.description: URL filtering, web gateway, SSL inspection
categories.examples: Zscaler, Squid, BlueCoat, browser history, WAF

categories.name: Application Logs
categories.description: Database, web server, SaaS, custom application logs
categories.examples: SQL audit, Apache/Nginx, Salesforce, Snowflake, app-specific

metadata.note: Manual mapping of HEARTH technique tags to broad data source categories
